data.title: Burning Heart Records
data.text:
Independent label founded by Peter Ahlqvist a.k.a Babs. In 1998 it was sold to Epitaph Records. In 2010 the label was closed and Peter Ahlqvist would start Panic & Action Records instead. After years of trying to get the name and logo back from Epitaph he finally succeeded to come with an agreement with Epitaph in 2014, who still owns the rights to the old back catalogue.

Previous address: Box 33, Fagersta, VÃ¤stmanlands, 737 41
